description: Seven bras have turned up on country lanes tied to fences but no one knows why.
title: Mystery as bras found tied to fences near Cornish villages
title_page: Mystery as bras found tied to fences near Cornish villages - BBC News
maintext:
Seven bras have mysteriously appeared tied to gates on country lanes in Cornwall.
Bemused farmer Michael Irwin first spotted a bright red bra attached to a gate two weeks ago then saw a blue one tied to barbed wire a few days later.
It is not known who tied the lingerie in place but each bra has been left near the villages of Lerryn and Lostwithiel.
Mr Irwin said: "We've been all waiting for somebody to announce it's a bit of a joke... but it's a strange way of doing it."
